Welcome to our Nature-Based Tourism App!.en: Welcome to our Nature-Based Tourism App!
Welcome to our Nature-Based Tourism App!.es: ¡Bienvenido a nuestra App sobre Turismo natural!
Welcome to our Nature-Based Tourism App!.it: Benvenuto alla nostra applicazione su turismo naturalistico!
Welcome to our Nature-Based Tourism App!.de: Herzlich willkommen zu unserer Natur-Erleben App!
Welcome to our Nature-Based Tourism App!.nb: Velkommen til vår app om naturbasert turisme!
Welcome to our Nature-Based Tourism App!.fr: Bienvenue à notre Application sur le Tourisme Vert!

We want to improve nature-based tourism.en: We want to improve nature-based tourism in Norway. We appreciate if you could spend a few minutes to map your sites and share your experiences.
We want to improve nature-based tourism.es: Nos gustaría mejorar el turismo natural en Noruega. Agradeceríamos que utilizases unos minutos para registrar los lugares que vas a visitar y compartir tus experiencias.
We want to improve nature-based tourism.fi: Haluamme parantaa luontomatkailua Norjassa. Olemme kiitollisia jos voit käyttää muutaman minuutin jakaaksesi käyntikohteesi ja kokemuksesi.
We want to improve nature-based tourism.it: Vorremo migliorare il turismo naturalistico in Norvegia. Ti saremmo grati se potessi dedicare alcuni minuti per registrare i luoghi che visiterai e condividere le tue esperienze.
We want to improve nature-based tourism.de: Es ist unser Anliegen naturnahen Tourismus in Norwegen zu fördern. Deshalb würden wir dich bitten einige Minuten damit zu verbringen deine Aufenthaltsorte zu kartografieren und deine Erlebnisse mit uns zu teilen.
We want to improve nature-based tourism.nb: Vi har svært lyst til å forbedre den naturbaserte turismen i Norge. Vi ville vært takknemlig om du kunne brukt noen få minutter til å kartlegge stedene du har besøkt og dele dine erfaringer.
We want to improve nature-based tourism.fr: Nous voulons améliorer le Tourismse Vert en Norvège et nous apprecirions si vous pouviez donner quelques minutes de votre temps pour cartographier vote site internet et partager vos expériences.

Your data will be treated with confident.en: Your data will be treated with confidentially and according to standards set by the data protection regulations in Norway. Please continue to the consent page
Your data will be treated with confident.es: Los datos son confidenciales de acuerdo con la Ley de protección de datos de Noruega. Por favor, haz click en “Empezar” para continuar a la página sobre nuestra política de confidencialidad.
Your data will be treated with confident.fi: Tietojasi käsitellään luottamuksellisesti ja Norjan tietosuojakäytäntöjen ja -standardien mukaisesti. Ole hyvä ja jatka sitoumussivulle.
Your data will be treated with confident.it: L'informazione sarà riservata, nel pieno rispetto della normativa di protezione dei dati personali di Norvegia. Vi preghiamo di fare clic su.
Your data will be treated with confident.de: Alle Informationen werden vertraulich und gemäß der norwegischen Standards für Daten- und Personenschutz gehandhabt. Fahr bitte mit der Einwilligungserklärung fort.
Your data will be treated with confident.nb: Ditt bidrag vil behandles anonymt og i tråd med retningslinjene for data- og personvern i Norge. Vennligst gå videre til neste side for å gi ditt samtykke.
Your data will be treated with confident.fr: Vos informations seront traitées de manière confidentielle selon les standards établis par la législation sur la protection des informtations numériques de Norvège.

Learn more about us here.it: Clicca qui per saperne di più su noi
Learn more about us here.nb: Få mer informasjon om oss her
Learn more about us here.fr: Pour en savoir plus sur nous

Please follow these instructions:.fi: Ole hyvä ja noudata näitä ohjeita:

2. Complete a short survey with demograp.en: 2. Complete a short survey with demographic variables.
2. Complete a short survey with demograp.es: 2. Completa el cuestionario sobre variables demográficas.
2. Complete a short survey with demograp.it: 2. Compili il questionario su variabili demografiche
2. Complete a short survey with demograp.de: 2. Fülle einen kurzen Fragebogen über deine demographischen Verhältnisse aus.
2. Complete a short survey with demograp.nb: 2. Fyll ut en kort demografisk spørreundersøkelse.
2. Complete a short survey with demograp.fr: 2. Complétez un court questionnaire à variantes démographiques

3. Track your activity. The activity cou.en: 3. Track your activity. The activity could take from few minutes jogging, fishing, hiking… to several days backpacking in nature for several days. Do not stop tracking until you completely finish the activity. Mark interesting waypoints and tag non-material benefits.
3. Track your activity. The activity cou.es: 3. Registra tu actividad. La actividad realizada puede ser desde minutos correr, pescar, paseos… hasta varios días acampadas en la naturaleza durante varios días. No pares el registro hasta que hayas completado la actividad. Marca puntos interesantes y asígnales etiquetas con los beneficios que ese lugar te aporte.
3. Track your activity. The activity cou.fi: 3. Seuraa ja tallenna jokin luontomatkailutoimintosi. Toiminto voi kestää minuuteista lenkkeily, kalastus, retkeily päiviin vaellus. Jatka toiminnon seurantaa sen koko keston ajan. Merkitse kiinnostavat reittipisteet ja niiden aineettomat hyödyt.
3. Track your activity. The activity cou.it: 3. Registra la tua attività. Può essere un’attività di minuti correre, pescare, passeggiare... oppure di diversi giorni campeggiare nella natura per alcuni giorni. Non smetti il registro fino ad aver completato l’attività. Segni punti interessanti etichettandoli in funzione dei loro vantaggi per te.
3. Track your activity. The activity cou.de: 3  Markiere deine Aktivität. Diese Aktivität kann von wenigen Minuten zB. joggen, fischen, wandern… bis zu mehreren Tagen zB. ein mehrtägiger Campingausflug in die Natur andauern. Hör erst dann mit dem Markieren auf wenn du deine Aktivität vollkommen abgeschlossen hast. Markiere interessante Wegpunkte kennzeichne immaterielle Nutzen.
3. Track your activity. The activity cou.nb: 3. Spor din aktivitet. Aktiviteten kan ta alt fra noen minutter og timer f. eks jogging, fisking, fottur, til flere dager lange turer i naturen med overnatting. Ikke stopp sporingen før du har fullført din aktivitet. Markér interessante punkter og hvilke ikke-materielle goder disse gir.
3. Track your activity. The activity cou.fr: 3. Enregistrer vos activités. L’activité peut prendre de quelques minutes jogging, pécher, randonner… à pulsieurs jours camping dans la nature pour pulsars jours. Ne cessez d’enregistrer que quand vous aves complètement terminé l’activité. Marquez les points de repère intéressants et autres bénéfices non-matériels

4. Complete a survey about the experienc.en: 4. Complete a survey about the experience you just had doing your nature activity TODAY only.
4. Complete a survey about the experienc.es: 4. Completa el cuestionario sobre la experiencia que has tenido HOY mientras registrabas la actividad realizada.
4. Complete a survey about the experienc.fi: 4. Täytä kysely kokemuksista, jotka liittyvät luontotoimintoosi TÄNÄÄN.
4. Complete a survey about the experienc.it: 4. Compili il questionario sulla tua esperienza di OGGI mentre registravi l’attività svolta.
4. Complete a survey about the experienc.de: 4. Fülle einen kurzen Fragebogen über die Erlebnisse die du während deines heutigen Naturaufenthaltes gehabt hast.
4. Complete a survey about the experienc.nb: 4. Fullfør en spørreundersøkelse om opplevelsen du hadde i naturen i DAG.
4. Complete a survey about the experienc.fr: 4. Remplissez un questionnaire à propos des expériences que vice aves eus durant vote activity verte AUJOURD’HUI seulement.

5. Press “Send” button when you have com.en: 5. Press “Send” button when you have completed the survey.
5. Press “Send” button when you have com.es: 5. Haz click en “Enviar” al finalizar el cuestionario.
5. Press “Send” button when you have com.fi: 5. Lähetä koko kyselytutkimus painamalla “Lähetä”, kun olet vastannut kaikkiin kohtiin.
5. Press “Send” button when you have com.de: 5. Übermittle den ausgefüllten Fragebogen indem du auf.
5. Press “Send” button when you have com.nb: 5. Trykk “Send”-knappen når du har fullført undersøkelsen.
5. Press “Send” button when you have com.fr: 5. Appuyez sur le bouton ´Envoyer´ quand vous avez rempli le questionnaire.

You will be able to withdraw from the st.en: You will be able to withdraw from the study at any point by sending an email to lorena.munoz@uit.no
You will be able to withdraw from the st.es: Si quieres abandonar el estudio una vez comenzado el cuestionario manda un correo electrónico a lorena.munoz@uit.no
You will be able to withdraw from the st.fi: Voit vetäytyä tutkimuksesta milloin vain lähettämällä sähköpostia osoitteeseen lorena.munoz@uit.no
You will be able to withdraw from the st.it: Se vuoi ritirarti dell’indagine dopo iniziare il questionario, invia una e-mail all’indirizzo lorena.munoz@uit.no
You will be able to withdraw from the st.de: Du kannst deine Teilnahme an der Studie jederzeit zurückziehen indem du ein Email an: Lorena.munoz@uit.no sendest
You will be able to withdraw from the st.nb: Du vil kunne trekke deg fra undersøkelsen på hvilket som helst tidspunkt ved å sende en e-post til lorena.munoz@uit.no
You will be able to withdraw from the st.fr: Vous sere capable de vice retirer de l’étude à n’importequel moment en envoyant un email à lorena.munoz@uit.no

If you consent to participate in the sur.en: If you consent to participate in the survey and to track your visit, your data will be analyzed together with the other visitors’ GPS data to create maps, reports and publications.
If you consent to participate in the sur.es: Si aceptas participar en el cuestionario y registrar tu actividad, tus datos serán analizados conjuntamente con los demás turistas para crear mapas, informes y publicaciones.
If you consent to participate in the sur.fi: Jos suostut osallistumaan kyselytutkimukseen ja matkailukäyntisi seurantaan, tietosi analysoidaan yhdessä muiden vierailijoiden GPS-aineiston kanssa. Luomme koko kyselyaineiston pohjalta karttoja, raportteja ja julkaisuja.
If you consent to participate in the sur.it: Se accetti partecipare nell’indagine e registrare la tua attività, i dati da te inseriti saranno analizzati insieme ai dati degli altri turisti al fine di creare carte geografiche, rapporti e pubblicazioni.
If you consent to participate in the sur.de: Wenn du dich dazu einverstanden erklärst an der Studie teilzunehmen und deinen Weg während deines Besuches zu markieren werden deine Daten gemeinsam mit den GPS-Daten anderer Besucher dazu verwendet Karten, Gutachten und Publikationen zu produzieren.
If you consent to participate in the sur.nb: Hvis du samtykker til å delta i denne undersøkelsen og til å kartlegge din aktivitet, vil informasjonen du bidrar med bli analysert sammen med andre deltakeres GPS-data og brukt til å produsere kart, rapporter og publikasjoner
If you consent to participate in the sur.fr: Si vous agréez de participer au questionnaire et enregistrer vote visite, vote information sera analysée ainsi que l’information GPS d’autres visiteurs afin de créer des cartes, raports et publications.

All personal data will be treated as per.en: All personal data will be treated as personal under the Norwegian 2000 Personal Data Act, and stored securely on a server at the Arctic University of Norway until 1st March 2018 when all this data will be deleted.
All personal data will be treated as per.es: Los datos personales serán tratados en cumplimiento con la Ley 2000 Noruega de datos personales de Noruega, y custodiados en un servidor seguro en la Universidad Ártica de Noruega hasta el 1 de marzo del 2018, tras la cual serán eliminados.
All personal data will be treated as per.fi: Kaikkia tietoja käsitellään henkilökohtaisina tietoina Norjan 2000 henkilötietolain mukaisesti. Kaikki tiedot tallennetaan turvallisesti Norjan Arktisen yliopiston palvelimelle 1. maaliskuuta 2018 saakka, jolloin tiedot tuhotaan.
All personal data will be treated as per.it: I dati personalli saranno trattati nel pieno rispetto della legge norvegese 2000 sui dati personali e conservati in modo sicuro su un server nella Università Artica di Norvegia fino al 1 marzo, 2018. Dopo verranno cancellati.
All personal data will be treated as per.de: Alle persönlichen Informtionen und Daten werden gemäß des norwegischen Datenschutzgesetzes von 2000 als persönlich behandelt und bis 1. 05. 2018 auf einem Server an der arktischen Universität von Norwegen UiT sicherheitsverwahrt und danach gelöscht.
All personal data will be treated as per.nb: All personlige data vil bli behandlet som personlig data i henhold til den norske personopplysningsloven fra 2000, og vil bli lagret på en sikker server på det Arktiske Universitetet i Norge til den første mars 2018, før de deretter slettes.
All personal data will be treated as per.fr: Toute l'information sera traitée come personelle suivant la loi Norvègienne de 2000 sur les données personelles. Ces informations seront conservées de manière sure sur un serveur de l'Université de Tromsø jusqu'au 1er Mars 2018, date où toutes ces informations seront effacées.

The data will be treated as confidential.en: The data will be treated as confidential and will not be passed on to any other party.
The data will be treated as confidential.es: Los datos serán confidenciales y no serán proporcionados a terceros.
The data will be treated as confidential.fi: Tietoja käsitellään luottamuksellisina eikä niitä luovuteta muiden tahojen käyttöön.
The data will be treated as confidential.it: I dati saranno considerati riservati e non saranno divulgati verso terzi.
The data will be treated as confidential.de: Die Daten werden vertraulich behandelt und nicht an Dritte Personen weitergegeben.
The data will be treated as confidential.nb: Dine data vil bli behandlet med fullstendig konfidensialitet og vil ikke bli delt med noen andre aktører.
The data will be treated as confidential.fr: Ces informations seront traitées comme confidentielles et ne seront pas transmises à d'autres parties.

No personally identifiable information w.en: No personally identifiable information will be used in reports or publications.
No personally identifiable information w.es: No se utilizarán datos personales en informes ni publicaciones.
No personally identifiable information w.fi: Mitään henkilöön viittaavaa tai henkilön tunnistuksen mahdollistavaa tietoa ei käytetä raporteissa tai julkaisuissa.
No personally identifiable information w.it: I dati personali non saranno utilizzati in richieste o pubblicazioni.
No personally identifiable information w.de: Keine Informationen die Aufschluss auf die Identität von Einzelpersonen geben können, werden in Gutachten und Publikationen verwendet werden.
No personally identifiable information w.nb: Ingen informasjon benyttet i rapporter eller publikasjoner vil kunne knyttes til deg.
No personally identifiable information w.fr: Aucune information personellement identifiable ne sera utilisée dans les articles ou autres publications.

For any queries please contact Lorena Mu.en: For any queries please contact Lorena Muñoz lorena.munoz@uit.no or Vera Hausner vera.hausner@uit.no
For any queries please contact Lorena Mu.es: Ante cualquier duda contacta con Lorena Muñoz Lorena.munoz@uit.no o Vera Hausner vera.hausner@uit.no
For any queries please contact Lorena Mu.fi: Kysymykset voi osoittaa Lorena Muñozille lorena.munoz@uit.no ja Vera Hausnerille vera.hausner@uit.no
For any queries please contact Lorena Mu.it: Di fronte a qualche dubbio scrivi a Lorena Muñoz lorena.munoz@uit.no o Vera Hausner vera.hausner@uit.no
For any queries please contact Lorena Mu.de: Um weitere Informationen zu erhalten nimm bitte Kontakt zu Lorena Muñoz lorena.munoz@uit.no oder Vera Hausner vera.hausner@uit.no auf.
For any queries please contact Lorena Mu.nb: Hvis du har noen spørsmål vennligst tak kontakt med Lorena Muñoz lorena.munoz@uit.no eller Vera Hausner vera.haunser@uit.no
For any queries please contact Lorena Mu.fr: Pour toute autre demandes veuilliez contacter Lorena Munoz lorena.munoz@uit.no ou Vera Hausner vera.hausner@uit.no

Q1. What is your country of residence? c.en: Q1. What is your country of residence? choose only 1
Q1. What is your country of residence? c.es: Q1. ¿En qué país resides? elige sólo una opción
Q1. What is your country of residence? c.fi: Q1. Missä maassa asut? valitse ainoastaan yksi
Q1. What is your country of residence? c.it: Q1. Qual è il tuo paese di residenza?
Q1. What is your country of residence? c.de: Q1. In welchem Land ist dein Hauptwohnsitz? Bitte nur eine Antwort auswählen
Q1. What is your country of residence? c.nb: Q1. I hvilket land bor du? Velg kun 1
Q1. What is your country of residence? c.fr: Q1. Quelle est votre pays de résidence choisir 1

Q4. What is the highest education level.en: Q4. What is the highest education level you have completed? choose only 1
Q4. What is the highest education level.es: Q4. ¿Cuál es tu nivel de educación elige sólo una opción
Q4. What is the highest education level.fi: Q4. Korkein suoritettu koulutusaste/tutkinto valitse ainoastaan yksi.
Q4. What is the highest education level.it: Q4. Qual è il tuo livello di istruzione?
Q4. What is the highest education level.de: Q4. Was ist der höchste Bildungsabschluss den du erworben hast? Bitte nur eine Antwort auswählen!
Q4. What is the highest education level.nb: Q4. Hva er det høyeste nivået av utdanning du har fullført? Velg kun 1
Q4. What is the highest education level.fr: Q4. Quel niveau d’éducation avez-vous complété ? choisissez seulement 1

Higher education College, University or.en: Higher education College, University or others
Higher education College, University or.es: Educación profesional bachillerato, universidad u otro
Higher education College, University or.fi: Ylemmän asteen koulutus korkeakoulu, yliopisto tai muu vastaava
Higher education College, University or.fr: Éducation supérieure université ou autre institution

Q5. What was the approximate total after.en: Q5. What was the approximate total after-tax income of your household for year 2014? choose only 1 [optional question]
Q5. What was the approximate total after.es: Q5. ¿Cuál fue el ingreso neto doméstico aproximado del 2014 elige una única opción?
Q5. What was the approximate total after.fi: Q5. Minkä suuruiseksi arvioit kotitaloutesi kokonaisansiot verojen jälkeen vuonna 2014? valitse ainoastaan yksi [valinnainen kysymys]
Q5. What was the approximate total after.it: Q5. Quale fu il tuo reddito al netto approssimato nel 2014? scegli solo un'opzione
Q5. What was the approximate total after.de: Q5. Wie hoch war das Gesamtnettoeinkommen deines Haushaltes im Jahr 2014? Bitt nur eine Antwort auswählen [die Antwort zu dieser Frage ist nicht verpflichtend]
Q5. What was the approximate total after.nb: Q5. Hva var den omtrentlige nettoinntekten for din husholdning i 2014? velg kun 1 valgfritt spørsmål
Q5. What was the approximate total after.fr: Q5. Quel est le revenu approximatif après les taxes de votre ménage pour l’année 2014? choisissez 1 [question optionelle]

Q6. How many times in the past have you.en: Q6. How many times in the past have you visited this area?
Q6. How many times in the past have you.es: Q6. ¿Cuántas veces has visitado esta zona antes?
Q6. How many times in the past have you.fi: Q6. Kuinka monta kertaa aiemmin olet käynyt tällä alueella?
Q6. How many times in the past have you.it: Q6. Quante volte avevi visitato questa zona prima?
Q6. How many times in the past have you.de: Q6. Wie oft hast du diese Gegend in der Vergangenheit besucht?
Q6. How many times in the past have you.nb: Q6. Hvor mange ganger tidligere har du besøkt dette området?
Q6. How many times in the past have you.fr: Q6. Combien de fois dans le passé avez-vous visité det endroit?

Now you are ready to track your activity.en: Now you are ready to track your activity.
Now you are ready to track your activity.es: Puedes empezar a registrar tu actividad.
Now you are ready to track your activity.it: Puoi cominciare a registrare la tua attività.
Now you are ready to track your activity.de: Du bist nun bereit deine Aktivität zu markieren.
Now you are ready to track your activity.nb: Nå er du klar til å kartlegge din aktivitet.
Now you are ready to track your activity.fr: Vous etes maintenant près a enregistrer votre activité

Please, do not stop tracking until you c.en: Please, do not stop tracking until you completely finish the activity. We would like you to create waypoints on places and tag them according to what you like or dislike in the place.
Please, do not stop tracking until you c.es: Por favor, no pares el registro de tu actividad hasta que la hayas terminado. Crea puntos de interés y etiquétalos con los atributos que te gusten o disgusten en ese específico lugar.
Please, do not stop tracking until you c.fi: Ole hyvä ja jatka seurantaa kunnes ole kokonaan lopettanut toiminnon. Pyydämme sinua luomaan uusia reittipisteitä paikkoihin ja sijanteihin ja merkitsemään ne sen mukaan, mistä pidit tai et pitänyt kyseisessä paikassa
Please, do not stop tracking until you c.it: Vi preghiamo di no fermare il registro prima di aver finito la tua attività. Crea punti di interesse ed etichettali secondo le caratteristiche che ti piacciono o non ti piacciono in quel luogo.
Please, do not stop tracking until you c.de: Bitte höre erst dann auf deinen Pfad zu markieren wenn du vollkommen mit deiner Aktivität fertig bist. Wir bitten dich an Orten an denen dir etwas positiv oder negativ auffällt Wegpunkte zu schaffen und uns deine Meinung über diesen Ort mitzuteilen.
Please, do not stop tracking until you c.nb: Vennligst ikke stopp sporingen til du er fullstendig ferdig med aktiviteten. Vi vil gjerne at du registrerer punkter langs ruten hvor du forklarer hva du liker eller misliker med det stedet.
Please, do not stop tracking until you c.fr: Veuilliez continuer d’enregistrer jusqu’à ce que vous ayez completement terminé l’activité. Nous désirons que vous créiez des points de repère et que vous les balisiez en accordance avec vos impressions, négatives et/ou positives à propos de cet endroit.

At the end of the activity provide a scr.en: At the end of the activity provide a screen with
At the end of the activity provide a scr.es: At the end of the activity provide a screen with
At the end of the activity provide a scr.fi: At the end of the activity provide a screen with
At the end of the activity provide a scr.it: At the end of the activity provide a screen with
At the end of the activity provide a scr.de: Zeige folgendes nach Abschluss der laufenden Aktivität auf dem Bildschirm an
At the end of the activity provide a scr.nb: På slutten av aktiviteten vises en skjerm med
At the end of the activity provide a scr.fr: A la fin de l’activité obtenir un écran avec

A map showing the trip.de: Eine Karte die meinen Pfad kennzeichnet

Q8. What nature-based activities did you.en: Q8. What nature-based activities did you participate in during the tracking today? Click multiple if relevant:
Q8. What nature-based activities did you.es: Q8. ¿Qué actividades has realizado en la naturaleza mientras utilizabas esta aplicación hoy? Elige más de una actividad si es necesario:
Q8. What nature-based activities did you.fi: Q8. Mihin luontoaktiviteetteihin osallistuit tänään toimintosi aikana? Voit merkitä useita vaihtoehtoja:
Q8. What nature-based activities did you.it: Q8. Quali sono le attività svolte oggi nella natura mentre usavi questa app? Se hai bisogno, scegli più di una attività:
Q8. What nature-based activities did you.de: Q8. An welchen naturverbundenen Aktivitäten hast du im Laufe deines heutigen Besuchs teilgenommen? Wähle alle zutreffende Aktivitäten aus:
Q8. What nature-based activities did you.nb: Q8. Hvilken naturbaserte aktiviteter utførte du under dagens sporing? trykk på flere hvis du utførte flere:
Q8. What nature-based activities did you.fr: Q8. Quelle activité verte avez-vous fais l’experience durant l’enregistrement aujourd’hui cliquer sur plusieurs si nécessaire:

Picking wild berries /mushrooms.it: Raccolta di frutti di bosco / funghi

Q9. With whom did you conduct these acti.en: Q9. With whom did you conduct these activities today? choose only 1
Q9. With whom did you conduct these acti.es: Q9. ¿Con quién has realizado las actividades hoy? Elige una única opción
Q9. With whom did you conduct these acti.fi: Q9. Kenen kanssa osallistuit tänään näihin aktiviteetteihin? valitse ainoastaan yksi
Q9. With whom did you conduct these acti.it: Q9. Con chi hai fatto l’attività oggi? (Scegli soltanto una opzione)
Q9. With whom did you conduct these acti.de: Q9. Wer hat dich heute bei deinem Ausflug begleitet? Bitte nur eine Antwort auswählen
Q9. With whom did you conduct these acti.nb: Q9. Hvem utførte du disse aktivitene med i dag? velg kun 1
Q9. With whom did you conduct these acti.fr: Q9. Avec qui avez-vous pris part a ces activitées aujourd’hui? choisissez seulement 1

Q10. The visit today has been important.en: Q10. The visit today has been important for…
Q10. The visit today has been important.es: Q10. La visita de hoy ha sido importante para…
Q10. The visit today has been important.fi: Q10. Tämänpäiväinen vierailu oli tärkeä seuraavista syistä:
Q10. The visit today has been important.it: Q10. La tua visita di oggi è stata importante per...
Q10. The visit today has been important.de: Q10. Der heutige Besuch hat dazu beigetragen…
Q10. The visit today has been important.nb: Q10. Dagens besøk har vært viktig for….

2. being together with my family/friends.it: 2. Essere con la mia famiglia / i miei amici

Q14. We would appreciate if we at a late.en: Q14. We would appreciate if we at a later stage could ask you few more questions. If so, please enter your email here:

Q14. We would appreciate if we at a late.nb: Q14. Vi ville satt pris på om vi kunne stille deg noen flere spørsmål ved en senere anledning. Hvis det er greit, skriv inn e-post adressen din her:
Q14. We would appreciate if we at a late.fr: Q14. nous apprécierions si nous pouvions vous poser quelques questions suplémentaires dans quelques temps. Si c’est le cas, veuilliex entrer votres adresse email ici:
